title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 455.22 - Transportation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 455.22 - Transportation

State Regulations

This functional reporting center must contain all the
expenses associated with the transporting of patients and supplies to and from
the facility on behalf of patient-related activities. Additional activities
include but are not limited to the following: transporting patients to and from
scheduled outside activities: transporting patients to and from department and
other stores; transporting supplies to be used in patient-related
activities. (a) Standard unit of
measure: number of trips. The total number of trips made for the purpose of
transporting patients and supplies to and from the facility. (b) Data source. The number of trips shall be
determined from departmental logs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
455.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
